greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Reciprocal of g.f. for A007863.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
formula: a(n) = -Sum_{i=0..n} binomial(n+i-2,n-2)*binomial(n+i-1,n-i))/(n-1), n>1; a(0)=1, a(1) = -2. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Feb 15 2013
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, 1, if (n==1, -2, -sum(i=0, n, binomial(n+i-2,n-2)*binomial(n+i-1,n-i))/(n-1))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 29 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
